snippet: The Israeli and American militaries are gearing up for a major missile defense exercise, the largest joint drill between the two countries, the Israeli military said Thursday.
abstract: Israeli and American militaries are gearing up for a major missile defense exercise, which will be the largest joint drill between the two countries.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli and American militaries are gearing up for a major missile defense exercise, the largest joint drill between the two countries, the Israeli military said Thursday.

headline.seo: Israel Will Join U.S. in Missile Drill

headline.print_headline: Israel Will Join U.S. in Missile Drill
